pages.text: For custom images you will need the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/resource-loader)RESOURCE LOADER MOD$(/l).$(br2)Load your images in [modpack]/resources/[bookname]/image.png$(br2)Then, in the "images" attribute, you would enter the string as an array so it would be ["Guidebook:image.png"]

pages.title: Title of image
pages.text: Images used here should ideally be dimensioned as 256x256
